Adopt Today

How to Adopt

  1. Choose your Pet

    2. Animals are placed on the website as soon as they are ready for adoption. New animals are added daily, so please keep checking if you do not see one who fits your family right away.

  2. Submit Adoption Application

    3. Once you find an animal you are interested in, click ‘Adopt Me’ on their profile page. You will then be asked to create an Adopets account and answer some questions about you and your family, your lifestyle, and what you are looking for in a pet. This will help us make sure they’re a good match for you.

About us

Welcome to Our Precious Paws Adoption Agency, where we believe in the power of love to transform lives. Our mission is to connect loving families with the perfect furry companions, creating lifelong bonds filled with joy, companionship, and endless tail wags.

At Our Precious Paws, we understand that adopting a pet is a life-changing decision. That's why we offer personalized matchmaking services to ensure that every adoption is a perfect fit for both the pet and the family. We provide comprehensive support to our adopters, from counseling on pet care and training to post-adoption resources.

We are more than just an adoption agency; we are a community of animal advocates, caregivers, and pet enthusiasts united by a shared goal: to make the world a better place, one adoption at a time. Join us in our mission to give every animal a chance to experience the love and care they deserve. Together, we can write heartwarming tales of happiness and hope, one pawprint at a time.
